channel.title: World News & Prophecy Online
channel.description: Get the latest blog and PodCast updates to WNP Online.

item.title: Economics is the New Politics
item.description: Israel has disengaged from the Gaza. Will peace break out?

item.title: Iran's Growing Threat in the Middle East
item.description: Iran's new president is moving rapidly to develop a nuclear capability. And it seems there is little that an be done to stop the process.

item.title: Papal Trip to Germany
item.description: Pope Benedict XVI will make his first major trip of his reign this week to German to attend a world youth congress.

item.title: Why Longitude?
item.description: Sometimes I am asked why I call this blog and podcast 'Longitude'. Listen and learn why.

item.title: "Europe is changing the world"
item.description: American influence in the world is pretty thin, says foreign policy expert Mark Leonard. Our European Correspondent Paul Kieffer analyzes recent comments on Europe's current "crisis"
